content.query:
CREATE TABLE active_subscribers_weekly
(
    [date] datetime2(7) NOT NULL
    ,week_end_subscribers int NULL
    ,unique_week_end_subscribers int NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
);
GO

CREATE TABLE active_subscribers_monthly
(
    [date] datetime2(7) NOT NULL
    ,month_end_subscribers int NULL
    ,unique_month_end_subscribers int NULL
)
WITH
(
    DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
    HEAP
);
GO
